sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STROMBUS, in natural hiſtory, a genus of vermes, belonging to the order of testacea. The animal is a limax 4 the hell is univalve and ſpiral ; the opening is much dilated, and ends in a canal which turns to the left. Gmelin enumerates 53 ſpecies; of which only one is peculiar to Britain, the pes pelecani. The ſpires are ten ; the lip is fingered ; the point very ſharp ; the length two inches.
